alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 1:41PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Tuscola and north central Lapeer Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 139 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vassar, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall and winds potentially in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Millington around 145 PM EDT. Mayville around 205 PM EDT. Kingston and Clifford around 220 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include East Dayton, Deford, Tuscola, Colling, Wilmot, Colwood, Ellington, Gilford, Watrousville and Silverwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
